const [recentActivities, setRecentActivities] = useState([ { id: 1, action: 'ÄÄƒng nháº­p', user: 'Admin', time: '2024-01-15 10:30', ip: '192.168.1.100' }, { id: 2, action: 'ThÃªm sÃ¡ch má»›i', user: 'Admin', time: '2024-01-15 09:45', ip: '192.168.1.100' }, { id: 3, action: 'Cáº­p nháº­t Ä‘Æ¡n hÃ ng', user: 'Admin', time: '2024-01-15 09:30', ip: '192.168.1.100' } ]); const handleInputChange = (field, value) => { setSettings(prev => ({ ...prev, [field]: value })); }; const handleSaveSettings = () => { // LÆ°u cÃ i Ä‘áº·t console.log('Saving settings:', settings); alert('CÃ i Ä‘áº·t Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘Æ°á»£c lÆ°u thÃ nh cÃ´ng!'); } }; const handleUploadLogo = () => { // Xá»­ lÃ½ upload logo alert('TÃ­nh nÄƒng upload logo sáº½ Ä‘Æ°á»£c triá»ƒn khai!'); }; const getNotificationIcon = (type) => { switch (type) { case 'order': return 'ðŸ›’'; case 'inventory': return 'ðŸ“¦'; case 'system': return 'âš™ï¸'; default: return 'ðŸ“¢'; } }; const getNotificationBadge = (type) => { switch (type) { case 'order': return 'success'; case 'inventory': return 'warning'; case 'system': return 'info'; default: return 'secondary'; } }; return (
